Hero Title:
Looking for a smarter
Virtual Phone System?
Hero Message: Fancy is a cloud-based communications solution for all kinds of businesses. We designed Fancy to empower our users with the data and analytics they need to both make and save money!
Cancel anytime: Best priced iPBX on the market and you can cancel any time
Feature Message: Make it easy to provide your business powerful phone service. No complex hardware to install or mantain. Fancy is simple to use and manage, requiring no technical expertise
Powerful Message: Your cloud-based phone system uses state-of-the-art telecom Voice and SMS technology
Credible Message: Make your business sound big with a fancy phone system
Easy Message: Works on a new or existing phone line. With a guided setup, account management, and reporting tools, you'll be ready in no time!
Smart Message: Think of it like AI for your phone. Tons of free features to make sure you optimize every call
Data Driven Message: We will provide you with your caller's data for everyday use, internal analytics or marketing purposes (CRM, SMS, Auto-Reply, etc.)
Affordable Message: We offer a generous all-in-one solution at the best price on the market. Feel free to shop around!
Pick a number Message: You can also port your number to Fancy for free
Record greetings: Record greetings or use recording service
Record greetings Message: Create your custom main greeting for auto attendant
Add extensions Message: Choose & customize extensions to forward your calls anywhere to your home, your office or your mobile
Receive reports Message: Monthly Weekly or Daily call reports and data insights on your calls
How It Works Message: The fanciest call management solution for small, medium & large business
Quote1: We are a people company. We are a family company. Like you, our mission is to connect people, therefore the needs of our clients come first
Quote2: We are proud of our customers and their growth, and would love to work with you
Testimony1: Fancy has allowed me to increase my sales all from the comfort of my home. As a start up, having the ability to handle multiple calls and direct them has been truly useful
Testimony2: Fancy is amazing! It has allowed my new business to sound more professional and fancy for our customers
Testimony3: Fancy is easy to set up and customize and the customer service has been amazing!
Testimony4: The call reports have allowed our company to follow up on all incoming leads! Highly recommended
About us message: Fancy is an all-in-one virtual phone service featuring auto-attendant, professional greetings, call data and a simple web interface that allows you to easily manage all of your business communications and data without hardware. Stay connected to your customers and understand what is relevant to your business
Plans and Features Message: Fancy's subscription program features the greatest value and benefits to give you the best possible experience. Each membership price tier is equipped with the same great features

Business hours description: Choose your business hours! (these will be the times your PBX message will be heard)
Downtime hours description: Hours where your business is not working
Notifications description: Provide the email to which you will receive your call detail records. Choose the frequency in which you wish to receive these
Custom extensions description: Choose the extension number  customers will dial to reach a person or department
Audio description: Predefined audio is an audio automatically generated by Fancy. You can also Upload personal Recording or buy a professional recording
